00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETER_PARTS_EXTRACTOR_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETER_PARTS_EXTRACTOR_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "types.hpp"
00025 
00026 #include <boost/algorithm/string.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/scoped_ptr.hpp>
00028 
00031 namespace clpp {
00032 
00035 namespace detail {
00036 
00039 class parameter_parts_extractor {
00040 public:
00041     explicit parameter_parts_extractor( const std::string& _name_value_separator ) :
00042             name_value_separator( _name_value_separator ) {}
00043 private:
00044     const std::string name_value_separator;
00045 public:
00046     std::string extract_name_from( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00047         str_storage inputed_parameter_parts = obtain_parts_of( inputed_parameter );
00048         const size_t parts_quantity = inputed_parameter_parts.size();
00049         std::string name = inputed_parameter;
00050         if ( 2 == parts_quantity ) {
00051             name = inputed_parameter_parts.front();
00052         } else if ( parts_quantity > 2 ) {
00053             notify_about_name_value_separator_repetition_in( inputed_parameter );
00054         }
00055         return name;
00056     }
00057 
00058     std::string extract_value_from( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00059         str_storage inputed_parameter_parts = obtain_parts_of( inputed_parameter );
00060         const size_t parts_quantity = inputed_parameter_parts.size();
00061         std::string value = inputed_parameter;
00062         if ( 2 == parts_quantity ) {
00063             value = inputed_parameter_parts.back();
00064         } else if ( parts_quantity > 2 ) {
00065             notify_about_name_value_separator_repetition_in( inputed_parameter );
00066         }
00067         return value;
00068     }
00069 private:
00070     str_storage obtain_parts_of( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00071         str_storage parts;
00072         boost::split( parts, inputed_parameter, boost::is_any_of( name_value_separator ) );
00073         return parts;
00074     }
00075 
00076     void notify_about_name_value_separator_repetition_in( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00077         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00078                                           + "Name-value separator repetition detected in parameter '" 
00079                                           + inputed_parameter + "'!";
00080         throw std::runtime_error( what_happened );
00081     }
00082 };
00083 
00084 typedef boost::scoped_ptr< parameter_parts_extractor > parameter_parts_extractor_p;
00085 
00086 } // namespace detail
00087 } // namespace clpp
00088 
00089 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETER_PARTS_EXTRACTOR_HPP
